programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."(n)

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: Catch Hell
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe directs and stars as a washed up Hollywood actor, who is kidnapped by two men connected to his past while on location in Louisiana, and finds himself in the middle of a twisted scheme with little chance to survive

programme.title: Summer of Blood
programme.desc: A black comedy about a misanthropic, emotionally stunted New Yorker who finds himself on the brink of a premature mid-life crisis when he rejects his girlfriend's marriage proposal, but his luck changes one fateful night when he runs into a vampire and gets a second chance at life

programme.title: Cockneys vs. Zombies
programme.desc: When contractors to an East London building site unlock a 350-year old vault full of seriously hungry zombies, it's up to the Cockney McGuire's - and their bumbling mates Mental Mickey and Davey Tuppance - to save the hostages, their grandfather, and East London from zombie Armageddon in this British comedy

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path(n)

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left(n)

programme.title: House of the Dead
programme.desc: Teenagers looking for a rave party on a dark island find to their horror that the event has been overrun by zombies occupying a lonely, abandoned mansion in this chilling action-horror adaptation of the popular video game. Jonathan Cherry, Tyron Leitso, Clint Howard, Ona Grauer, Ellie Cornell, William Sanderson and Jurgen Prochnow star in this film from director Uwe Boll(n)

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own(n)

programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover(n)

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: Comeuppance
programme.desc: Jeannie reaches out to an old friend for help with a government contract, causing an issue between her and Marty about their future with Dollahyde. Clyde creates friction between Monica and her client, Vincent; and Doug makes a play for Caitlin(c)

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival test as she attempts to evade the killers and protect his teenage daughter. Stars Stephen Dorff

programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n)

programme.title: Passion Of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")(n)

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.desc: Darwyn befriends a pesticide plant worker in order to buy some of his company's product under the table for the cell, while each of the jihadis cope with personal troubles of their own(c)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a former drug-dealing criminal who undergoes an astonishing transformation and finds his unexpected calling in war-torn Sudan by leading armed missions into enemy territory to rescue kidnapped children

programme.title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two quirky friends who became unlikely legends by hosting a radio show that introduced the world to the biggest hip-hop artists of the 90s, including Nas, Biggie, Wu-Tang, Jay-Z, Eminem and the Fugees. Includes interviews with the rap world's luminaries

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: The Last One
programme.desc: A documentary uncovering the birth of The AIDS Memorial Quilt, which became a galvanizing force against bigotry and a flag in the fight for a cure. This moving story explores the quest to sew on the last panel, representing the final death and an end to the disease. Features archival footage, vérité scenes and interviews with the quilt makers and activists

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: A madcap dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the woman who inspires him to try to get it together

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Liv Tyler and Ben Affleck star in this romantic comedy about a music promoter whose career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, leaving him to take care of his precocious daughter. Also stars Jennifer Lopez, Will Smith and Jason Biggs

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: During a visit to his Massachusetts home town, a professional piano player (Timothy Hutton) gets involved with both a sexy fellow visitor (Uma Thurman) and the alluring teenager (Natalie Portman) now living next door to his childhood home. Also stars Matt Dillon, Rosie O'Donnel and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: The Ladykillers (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Tom Hanks stars in this Coen Brothers slapstick comedy as a devious criminal hiding beneath the persona of a silver-tongued southern gentleman so that he can commit the heist of the century by tunneling through his churchgoing landlady's cellar to a casino's vault of riches

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.desc: The cell buys explosives from a white supremacist militia while Darwyn's new handler, Patrice Serxner, tries to prevent the LAPD from blowing his cover in a conflicting investigation(n)

programme.title: Sexy Wives Sinsations
programme.desc: Sequel to the supercharged erotic thriller set in a sex clinic that features new doctors, new patients and new beauties who indulge in a series of smoldering encounters(n)

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit The Logic
programme.desc: Mike Epps, Richard Pryor Jr. and others recount the culture-defining influence of Richard Pryor - one of America's most brilliant, iconic comic minds - in this new documentary. Directed by Emmy(R)-winning filmmaker Marina Zenovich and executive produced by Roy Ackerman and Pryor's widow, Jennifer Pryor(n)

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order(n)

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard(n)

programme.title: Up Close & Personal
programme.desc: An ambitious, beautiful TV news reporter climbs the ladder of broadcasting success while romancing her more experienced mentor in this romantic drama that plays like "A Star is Born" set in the world of journalism. Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert Redford and Stockard Channing star(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door(n)

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women's group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Provodnikov vs. Molina Jr. (R)
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME BOXING tripleheader featuring fan favorite Ruslan Provodnikov (25-4, 18 KOs) in a head to head super lightweight battle against John Molina Jr. (28-6, 23 KOs). In co-features number one-ranked lightweight Dejan Zlaticanin (17-0, 10 KOs) takes on number two-ranked Emiliano Marsili (32-0-1, 13 KOs) for the vacant title, plus undefeated southpaw Demetrius Andrade (22-0, 15 KOs) faces hard-hitting road warrior Willie Nelson (25-2-1, 15 KOs) in a super welterweight title eliminator. Live from Turning Stone Casino in Verona, NY. REPLAY(c)

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Winter Wonderlust
programme.desc: A few too many cocktails turn Marisa and Brian's blind date into an overnight stay. Foiled by an ice storm, they then get unexpectedly stuck together over a holiday weekend. With nothing else to do but get to know one another, they learn that sometimes first impressions are quite wrong

programme.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
programme.desc: Combining scintillating film clips of the 32 greatest adult movies ever produced with in-depth interviews from the biggest stars in the industry, this erotic documentary is the definitive look at the art of carnal films. Hosted by Chanel Preston, with Jenna Jameson, Ron Jeremy, Marilyn Chambers, Christy Canyon, Jessica Drake, Georgina Spelvin and many more

programme.title: Dirty Pretty Things
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant from Nigeria works at a West London hotel where nefarious business is constantly underway but when he discovers a human heart in one of the toilets, he is lured into a dangerous pact that could offer him a chance at a better life. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor and Audrey Tatou

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. Features Robert Redford, River Phoenix, Sidney Poitier and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Turbulence 2
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a therapy group who have completed a program to overcome their severe fear of flying are the victims of an airplane hijacking. With the pilot dead and the hijackers threatening to blow them all away, one of the passengers must race against the clock to bring the plane safely to the ground

programme.title: Turbulence 3
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a rock superstar decides to stage his final show aboard a jumbo jet, broadcasting the gig live to millions of fans over the Internet, but he didn't count on a deranged fan with a gun who hijacks the plane, throwing the show and the passengers lives into lethal chaos

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the first of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Beth Stelling, Iliza Shlesinger, Mark Normand, Matt Braunger, and Nate Bargatze

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After a public declaration from Marisol, Hector's rematch with Whittaker is cancelled. However, Ray enlists the help of Lena and Daryll to ensure the match proceeds. Meanwhile, an angry neighbor confronts the Donovans about Conor's reckless behavior. And Teresa's worsening depression causes her family to have her committed to a mental hospital(n)

programme.title: SCB30: Tyson vs. Holyfield I
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents one of the most famous upset victories in boxing history: Mike Tyson's first heavyweight title defense - and staggering loss - against Evander Holyfield(n)

programme.title: SCB30: Broner vs. Maidana
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents undefeated welterweight Adrien "The Problem" Broner getting outworked - and floored twice - in a big-time upset by Argentina's Marcos Maidana(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study(n)

programme.title: Steve-O: Guilty As Charged
programme.desc: Comedy special starring comedian, author and all-round lunatic Steve-O, who went from humble beginnings as a circus clown to hitting the big time in 'Jackass'. Expect the unexpected as he performs hilariously outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back(n)

programme.title: Turbulence 3
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a rock superstar decides to stage his final show aboard a jumbo jet, broadcasting the gig live to millions of fans over the Internet, but he didn't count on a deranged fan with a gun who hijacks the plane, throwing the show and the passengers lives into lethal chaos(n)

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Outlaw brothers Frank and Jesse James seek revenge for their murdered brother and become infamous public enemies to the Union soldiers occupying their post-Civil War territory but legendary heroes to the downtrodden locals who cheer their bank-and-train-robbing antics. Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton and Randy Travis star in this Western action adventure(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as a famed scientist who unearths a prehistoric specimen in the Arctic that soon unleashes a swarm of dangerous parasites, forcing himself and his students to quarantine themselves or risk infecting the world(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: The War
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a Vietnam vet who has high hopes of rebuilding his life in this heartwarming tale of a close-knit family, set in Mississippi during the summer of 1970. Elijah Wood also stars as his son

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: The Prisoner Of Zenda, Inc.
programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: Under the hot pursuit of loan sharks, with nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, Kevin Franklin (Sinbad) stumbles directly into the break of a lifetime: a friendly family man (Phil Hartman) who thinks that Kevin's an old childhood buddy. Guess who's coming to dinner? Jeffrey Jones, Kim Greist, Stan Shaw, Tony Longo, Mason Adams and Ron Glass costar in this zany domestic comedy

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: A hard working, blue collar mechanic sues for custody of his three daughters, and falls in love with his beautiful lawyer in this domestic drama from writer and director Tyler Perry, starring Idris Elba, Gabrielle Union and Louis Gossett Jr(n)

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: It's high comedy on the high seas as kooky captain-for-hire Kurt Russell helps a family of big city landlubbers break in their new boat-his way! Yes, from stormy seas to modern-day pirates, Mom (Mary Kay Place), Dad (Martin Short) and the kids are in for the Caribbean adventure of a lifetime - whether they want one or not! Benjamin Salisbury, Meadow Sisto, Emannuel Logrono, Jorge Luis Ramos and J.A. Preston co-star(n)

programme.desc: Hiding out from the police, a thief meets a bedridden senior citizen who begs him to end her life in this short from filmmaker Oscar Daniels(n)

programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story

Stars Pablo Schreiber

Unfortunately, in past episodes Grady could barely take a breath without getting mixed up in murder, and this episode is no exception: the victim is a peg-legged sailor, who is killed smack in the middle of Jessica's living room! programme.title: Expecting a Miracle
programme.desc: A troubled young couple discovers that sometimes you must endure great hardship to discover where you really need to be in life after heading for Mexico on vacation, and finding themselves hopelessly stranded in the dessert. Pete (Jason Priestly) and Donna (Teri Polo) were eager to start a family when their fertility tests revealed they could never have a child of their own. Devastated, the couple accepts an invitation by one of Pete's colleagues to spend some time at his vacation home south of the border. Shortly after crossing into Mexico, however, they take a wrong turn down a rough road, and their SUV breaks down. Thankfully, a road sign indicates that the town of Dommatina is within walking distance, and before long Pete and Donna are safe in the company of kind strangers. Though they'd planned on getting their vehicle repaired as quickly as possible in order to reach their intended destination, a chance encounter with a benevolent priest (Cheech Marin) and a young boy leaves the wayward couple wondering if their true family had been waiting for them in Dommatina all along(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: An egotistical TV reporter learns to appreciate the good things in life thanks to an eccentric, homeless clairvoyant in this old-fashioned romantic comedy from director Stephen Herek (Mr. Holland's Opus). Seattle native Lanie Kerrigan (Angelina Jolie) has spent most of her adult existence trying to live down her gawky, geeky adolescence: She toils for hours at the gym to keep cellulite at bay; she's managed to snag an engagement to a star baseball player (Christian Kane); and through her chipper puff pieces on the nightly news, she's cultivated a loyal following of couch potatoes who pester her for autographs. She's ready to take the next step to national news when her boss suggests she further hone her skills with ace cameraman Pete Scanlon (Edward Burns), who also happens to be an old flame of Lanie's. Her comfortable but shallow existence begins to change the moment she and Pete do a story on Prophet Jack (Tony Shaloub), a sage soothsayer who spouts unusually accurate predictions to passers-by in exchange for spare change. Jack offers up the theory that Lanie will not get her cushy promotion; in fact, he says she'll die within a week. When Jack's other prophecies start coming true, Lanie starts living each day as if it were her last -- much to the dismay of her co-workers and her fiancé(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: It's said that most American men think about sex once every two or three minutes, but this statistic would seriously underestimate the horniness of Jim (Jason Biggs), a high school senior in suburban Michigan. Jim is thoroughly obsessed with sex, a fact of which his parents become aware when they discover him performing the sin of Onan with a gym sock while watching scrambled pay-per-view porn. Jim's buddies Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas), Finch (Eddie Kaye Thomas), and Oz (Chris Klein) are no less anxious to relieve themselves of their virginity, so they all make a pledge: they will go to bed with a woman in the three weeks before senior prom or die trying. Kevin appears to have the advantage, since he already has a girlfriend, Vicky (Tara Reid), but before he ventures into the Final Frontier, Kevin is urged to consult "The Bible," a hand-written how-to manual possessing erotic wisdom passed down through the ages. Oz is a good-looking jock who is actually a nice guy -- which is part of the problem, since he has his heart set on a nice girl, Heather (Mena Suvari), who does not seem the type to leap into bed within 21 days. Finch has no immediate prospects, though Jessica (Natasha Lyonne) is in a position to know if those rumors about him are true. And Jim is a truly hopeless case -- after his attempted seduction of beautiful Czech exchange student Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth) turns out to be a disaster, he ends up going to the prom with Michelle (Alyson Hannigan), an annoyingly chatty band geek who does, however, have a fascinating story about a flute. American Pie was the directorial debut of Paul Weitz, who, along with his brother Chris Weitz (who served as producer), previously wrote several screenplays, including Antz and Madeline (where they presumably worked all their wholesome ideas out of their system)(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E

Is he first generation American or from a long line of Bengali ancestors? As he and his parents try to make sense of his problems and, indeed, their places in the contemporary world, this is a moving, thought-provoking examination of the immigrant experience

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is faced with an unexpected pregnancy, she enlists the aid of her best friend in finding the unborn child a suitable home in this coming-of-age comedy drama from Thank You for Smoking director Jason Reitman. Juno (Ellen Page) may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker (Michael Cera), the pregnant teen quickly realizes how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents (J.K. Simmons and Allison Janney) who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah (Olivia Thirlby), who's always willing to help out in a pinch. With a little help from Leah, Juno soon comes into contact with Mark (Jason Bateman) and Vanessa (Jennifer Garner) -- an affluent suburban couple who have been unable to conceive a child of their own. Mark and Vanessa seem like they would make great parents, and are eager to adopt Juno's unborn child. Now, as adolescent Juno is faced with a series of very adult decisions, she will draw on the support of her family and friends in order to discover who she truly is, and discover that one bad choice can have a lifetime of consequences(n)

Macy, is the executive producer. The film is the directorial debut of Duncan Tucker, who wrote the script

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Lighthearted romantic tale of down-at-heel waitress Frankie and ex-con cook Johnny, who is smitten by her on his first day at the diner. Despite their initial differences, Johnny's silver-tongued courtship gradually melts away Frankie's icy exterior

programme.title: Bronco Billy
programme.desc: Bronco Billy stars Clint Eastwood (who also directed) as the impresario of a seedy wild west show. Going along for the ride is spoiled socialite Sondra Locke, who is "initiated" by being pressed into service as the wrong end of a knife-throwing act. The rest of the troupe, like Eastwood himself, are losers in life who yearn for the freedom and opportunity of the long-gone Old West. Despite its raucous ad campaign, Bronco Billy is at base a wistful character study, avoiding the usual trappings of car chases and redneck villains and offering quiet chuckles instead of belly laughs. Unfortunately it failed to click with the public, compelling Eastwood to temporarily return to his old crash-bang-pow formula in his next few films

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her hopes are dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her if only they didn't mix like oil and water..

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: Richard Marin and Thomas Chong's misadventures as bumbling musicians

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Mike Mitchell's adult comedy stars Rob Schneider as Deuce Bigalow, a fish-tank cleaner who is asked to house sit a gigolo's house and aquarium. Accidentally breaking the tank, there's only one way he can afford to replace it - start accepting the phone calls to his absent host's business and fill in for him. Cue a series of 'dates', ranging from a woman with Tourette's syndrome to one suffering from narcolepsy, via an Amazonesque woman with peculiar pedicural proclivities

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: John Waters does a quirky spin on '50s nostalgia in Cry-Baby, his musical homage to Rebel Without a Cause and +Romeo and Juliet. Set in Baltimore in 1954 at the birth of rock & roll, the film features Johnny Depp as Wade "Cry-Baby" Walker. Depp is pure charisma as a juvenile delinquent with a permanent tear slithering down his cheek, a reminder of his state-executed parents. In the depths of his despair appears goody-goody girl Allison (Amy Locane), who has a sexual crush on Cry-Baby. But Allison's Pat Boone-like boyfriend, Baldwin (Stephen E. Miller), the leader of the squares, is dead set against Cry-Baby and the rest of the juvenile delinquents and leads a revolt against them. In the resultant riot, the juvenile delinquents are blamed for the chaos, and Cry-Baby finds himself dispatched to reform school

programme.title: The Man with One Red Shoe
programme.desc: A concert violinist with a very individual dress sense finds himself becoming embroiled in a CIA plot when the mysterious Maddy starts showering him with affection. Remake of the French film 'The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe'

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Real-life siblings Beau and Jeff Bridges star as the eponymous Fabulous Baker Boys. Musical prodigies both, the Bakers have long been teamed as a twin-piano act, with the less talented Frank (Beau Bridges) coasting on the skills of his brilliant younger brother, Jack (Jeff Bridges). Their career dwindling to nickel-and-dime dates in second-rate clubs, the Bakers decide that they need a female vocalist to boost their popularity. They select auditioner Susie Diamond (Michelle Pfeiffer), who in addition to being a gifted songstress is drop-dead gorgeous. The newly renovated Baker Boys act scores a success, which is inevitably threatened by Susie's growing popularity and by Jack's insistence upon pursuing an affair with the girl

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her hopes are dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her if only they didn't mix like oil and water..

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver discusses the events of the week in his satirical style

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Mike Mitchell's adult comedy stars Rob Schneider as Deuce Bigalow, a fish-tank cleaner who is asked to house sit a gigolo's house and aquarium. Accidentally breaking the tank, there's only one way he can afford to replace it - start accepting the phone calls to his absent host's business and fill in for him. Cue a series of 'dates', ranging from a woman with Tourette's syndrome to one suffering from narcolepsy, via an Amazonesque woman with peculiar pedicural proclivities

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: Comic thriller about a mob boss who unleashes deadly critters on a plane in an attempt to silence a murder witness(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is faced with an unexpected pregnancy, she enlists the aid of her best friend in finding the unborn child a suitable home in this coming-of-age comedy drama from Thank You for Smoking director Jason Reitman. Juno (Ellen Page) may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker (Michael Cera), the pregnant teen quickly realizes how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents (J.K. Simmons and Allison Janney) who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah (Olivia Thirlby), who's always willing to help out in a pinch. With a little help from Leah, Juno soon comes into contact with Mark (Jason Bateman) and Vanessa (Jennifer Garner) -- an affluent suburban couple who have been unable to conceive a child of their own. Mark and Vanessa seem like they would make great parents, and are eager to adopt Juno's unborn child. Now, as adolescent Juno is faced with a series of very adult decisions, she will draw on the support of her family and friends in order to discover who she truly is, and discover that one bad choice can have a lifetime of consequences(n)

programme.title: D.C. Cab
programme.desc: In this casual, uninvolved comedy running on a low-octane script, a scruffy taxi company is about to be wiped out when its owner Harold (Max Gail) exhorts his cabbies to do what they can to help save the company -- and what they can do turns out to be a surprise to everyone concerned. Saving the day (and the film) are the likeable, eccentric drivers, introduced by means of a new trainee (Adam Baldwin) who rides around with each in turn(n)

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: When an ambitious actress takes a job on a top rated soap opera she devises a plot with her producer to ruin the career of the TV show's star(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: J.C. receives news that she has inherited a baby girl from a relative. After failing to get the baby adopted by another couple, the child becomes very attached to J.C., who reluctantly keeps the youngster. Eventually the child's mischief leads to a series of comical events that cost J.C. her job and her boyfriend, but lead her to invent an applesauce recipe for children that makes her a very wealthy woman(n)

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: Georgia (Nia Vardalos) came to Greece to follow a man. A few years later, she's been cast aside -- alone and adrift in a foreign land. Eventually, her passion for history leads her to a job as a tour guide. But Georgia is bored, and has lost her "kefi" (Greek for mojo) to boot. When taciturn sasquatch Poupi (Alexis Georgoulis) replaces the regular driver at the last minute, the frazzled tour guide thinks that her luck has just hit rock bottom. Thankfully, Georgia's latest batch of tourists is a more lively bunch than she's anticipated, and in between bouts with rival tour guide Nico (Alistair McGowan), she manages to form a genuine connection with wisecracking widower Irv (Richard Dreyfuss), a solo vacationer who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. With a little help from Irv, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks -- if she could just recapture her kefi and open her eyes(n)

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Action and fast talking comedy abounds as motormouth Chris Tucker stars alongside Charlie Sheen as an escaped convict being chased by the police and a gang of diamond thieves. Franklin Hatchett is a small-time con man exposed by investigative reporter James Russell . When Hatchett becomes unwittingly involved in a jail break, the police think the escape was his idea. Not knowing where to hide, he calls the reporter and makes a deal: he will provide Russell with the exclusive story when he turns himself in, providing that Russell shelters him for the weekend. With a plan so simple, what could possibly go wrong?(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Sonny (Dev Patel) prepares to expand the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful while planning his impending wedding to Sunaina (Tena Desae) in this sequel that reteams director John Madden and screenwriter Ol Parker. As the contented residents of the hotel begin settling into their new lives, Sonny strives to balance the demands of planning his wedding with the responsibilities of purchasing a new property. Meanwhile, new guests Guy (Richard Gere) and Lavinia (Tamsin Greig) find themselves in a predicament after arriving at the hotel to find there is only one vacancy. Perhaps with a little innovation new co-manager Muriel (Maggie Smith) can find a means of accommodating the hotel's latest occupants, but she'll have her work cut out for her as Douglas (Bill Nighy) and Evelyn (Judi Dench) begin their new careers in Jaipur while flirting with the idea of a serious romance -- like Norman (Ronald Pickup) and Carol (Diana Hardcastle). With romance in the air it's no wonder that Madge (Celia Imrie) has her pick of handsome suitors, and as stalwart Muriel safeguards the many secrets of the vivacious residents, Sonny and Sunaina learn that planning a traditional Indian wedding can be a true test of commitment(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: In this millennial screwball comedy, a mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home. Starring Gary Oldman, William Hurt and Matt LeBlanc

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated sequel sees the citified critter castaways getting airlifted off the island only to crash-land in the jungles of the dark continent, where they meet their species counterparts in the wild

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Tight Loose Squeeze. Topics include "Tight," "Loose" and "Squeeze."

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: The Flower Show. Stinky worries that he won't bloom in time for a flower show

programme.title: Pinky Dinky Doo
programme.desc: Burpzilla; Happy Burp Day. Pinky must come up with a better ending for a story about a monster that eats the city's power plant; Tyler looks for a special birthday gift for his friend

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Latino Festival. A street festival celebrates Spanish culture and language(r)

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Hit Miss Bump. Topics include "Hit," "Miss" and "Bump."(r)

programme.title: Pinky Dinky Doo
programme.desc: Burpzilla; Happy Burp Day. Pinky must come up with a better ending for a story about a monster that eats the city's power plant; Tyler looks for a special birthday gift for his friend(r)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: The Fisherman and His Wife. A Spanish-influenced rendering of a tale about an enchanted fish who offers "The Fisherman and His Wife" a wish. Voices include Edward James Olmos (Fisherman) and Julia Migenes (Tina)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Aladdin. "Aladdin" takes the form of an adventurous Chinese dreamer (voice of B.D. Wong) as he befriends a magical genie who helps him best a wicked sorcerer and his daft son and win the hand of a fair princess

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Once upon a time, in a far away swamp, there lived an ornery ogre named Shrek whose precious solitude is suddenly shattered by an invasion of annoying fairy tale characters, all banished from their kingdom by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home Shrek cuts a deal with Farquaad and sets out to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona to be Farquaad's bride

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Workers on a building site uncover a mysterious object which unleashes the feared 'Ivan Ooze'. The Power Rangers are called in to protect the Earth

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: Kids of all ages will jockey for position in front of the TV for this heartwarming and funny family comedy about an abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) that yearns to be a Thoroughbred after it is adopted by a Kentucky farm girl (Hayden Panettiere). Bruce Greenwood, Wendie Malick, M. Emmet Walsh. Other voices include Dustin Hoffman, Mandy Moore, Joe Pantoliano, Whoopi Goldberg, Michael Clarke Duncan, Snoop Dogg, Steve Harvey and David Spade

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Bluefoot. Hector and his pals investigate a mythical creature called Bluefoot

programme.desc: Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Aidan McArdle, Joanna Lumley, Lucy Punch. Family adventure with Anne Hathaway. A young girl, under a spell to be obedient at all times, sets off on a journey to remove the curse and falls for a prince. Dir: Tommy O'Haver

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Once upon a time, in a far away swamp, there lived an ornery ogre named Shrek whose precious solitude is suddenly shattered by an invasion of annoying fairy tale characters, all banished from their kingdom by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home Shrek cuts a deal with Farquaad and sets out to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona to be Farquaad's bride

programme.title: Parent Handbook: Reading Your Heart Out
programme.desc: Students in a Jacksonville, Fla., classroom write poems expressing something they want to say to their parents and then are asked to read the poems aloud to their parents

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey stars as a PI who loses his memory prior to testifying against a mob boss

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: The appointment of black coach Herman Boone to a high school in 70s Virginia causes a stir in the town, where white coach Yoast is well-respected. Boone walks into a minefield of bigotry but his fair-minded approach gradually wins the hearts of his players. Drama(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The evil Ivan Ooze is accidentally unleashed on the world and it's up to the multicoloured heroes to prevent him turning all grown-ups into zombies(n)

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish(n)

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: Wonderful blend of live action and CGI animation telling the amazing coming-of-age tale of a lazy young boy (Zhu Oi Long) who discovers an enchanted fruit that has the power to grant wishes and give him anything his heart desires. But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Work Play Skip. Topics include "Work," "Play" and "Skip."(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Sesame Oceans. Dorothy can swim anywhere after Abby turns Sesame Street into a magical ocean, but Elmo and Abby must follow to clues to find her after the goldfish disappears(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: The Good Sport. Elmo learns how to win gracefully and lose graciously while playing hot potato with Abby(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Hard Easy Change. Topics include "Hard," "Easy" and "Change."(n)

programme.title: Pinky Dinky Doo
programme.sub-title: The Mystery Planet; Octopus Tap Shoes
