programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: The Shoemaker and the Elves. An Aztec-influenced version of "The Shoemaker and the Elves" recounts the story of nocturnal sprites who create superb footwear for a cobbler and his wife. Features the voice talent of Maria Conchita Alonso and Lou Diamond Phillips(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.sub-title: King Midas and the Golden Touch
programme.desc: King Midas and the Golden Touch. An African monarch (voice of Blair Underwood) learns what is truly precious in life in "King Midas and the Golden Touch." Other voice talent includes Alfonso Ribeiro (Kephra) and Jennifer Holliday (Dream Diva)(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: It is the year 1957 and Hogarth Hughes, a little boy who lives in the small town of Rockwell, discovers a man made out of iron, who comes from outer space and lost his memory, and saves him of dying by electrocution. Because of living in the middle of the Cold War, the boy thinks that the best option for this iron man is to stay in the junkyard of one of his friends and hide there until they get to a solution but an egocentric general of the military forces finds out what happened and begins to search for the giant in order to destroy him. Meanwhile, even though the boy thought he was going to find more help, the people of the town begin to feel terrified and want the problem to be solved no matter what(n)

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Madagascar continuing the adventures of the animals from a New York zoo who have become trapped on the African island. While attempting to fly a plane back to New York, the animals crash land in mainland Africa, where they are amazed to be reunited with more of their own kind and, in some cases, their actual families. Unfortunately, life in Africa is not what it at first seems, with Alex soon falling foul of lion etiquette and the humans causing problems for all of the wild animals of the Savannah(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Bananas. The gang helps Annie's Uncle Sigmund, who gets tongue-tied every time he tries to talk to his friend Natalie(n)

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish(n)

programme.title: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: If you could talk to the child that you used to be, what advice would you give him? That question forms the basis of this comic fantasy. Forty-year-old Russ Duritz (Bruce Willis) is a wealthy and powerful "image consultant" who has made a career out of telling people how to present themselves. But while he's a success in business, he's a failure in life; he's vain, mean-spirited, and hasn't been able to hold onto a marriage (or even a pet dog). One day, Russ is startled to meet Rusty (Spencer Breslin), a stocky kid whom he soon realizes is himself at the age of eight, having passed through a wrinkle in time. Young Rusty doesn't seem much happier than the grown-up Russ, so the older man takes his younger self under his wing and tries to teach him how to avoid the mistakes he's made, while Rusty encourages Russ to be a more caring human being. Along the way, Russ and Rusty become friends, and realize how much they can learn from each other. Disney's The Kid also stars Jean Smart as one of Russ' clients, Lily Tomlin as his assistant, and Daniel Von Bargen as his father(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium(n)

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: A girl discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has special powers(n)

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: The Jonas Brothers burn up the big screen in this 3-D rockumentary chronicling their "Burning Up" concert tour. The film features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, a brand-new song, and special guest performances by Taylor Swift and Demi Lovato. Directed by Bruce Hendricks ("Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert")

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: Hostel director Eli Roth's first exuberant take on the horror genre features five teenagers on holiday at a cabin in the woods. But their peace is interrupted by a dying hermit who infects their drinking water with a hideous virus, plunging them into a grisly fight for survival

programme.title: The Mistress of Spices
programme.desc: Former Miss World Aishwarya Raj plays Tilo, a member of a secret clan of women who draw on the mystical properties of Indian spices to cure anything from heartache to heartburn. Practising her delicate skills in California, she is courted by both homesick taxi driver Haroun and sexy architect Doug but which one will steal her heart in Paul Mayeda Berges' mystical romantic drama? Edited for violence, language

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: Modern-day film noir, set in Miami, about a wine merchant and a jewel thief who plan the theft of a $1 million diamond necklace. But things go awry when the wine merchant's wife and son decide to leave him - unwittingly taking the stolen necklace with them

programme.title: Prayer for a Perfect Season
programme.desc: A look at the 2010-11 boys' basketball season at St. Patrick's High School in Elizabeth, N.J. The documentary follows Kevin Boyle and his players on their trek towards a climactic, winner-take-all showdown against archrival St. Anthony's of Jersey City. Included: comments from players and coaches

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: This drama is based on Laurel Hester a New Jersey police lieutenant (Julianne Moore) and her domestic partner Stacie Andree (Ellen Page) who battle to have pension benefits from Hester pass on to her partner after she is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. Directed by Peter Sollett. Also stars Steve Carell, Michael Shannon, Josh Charles, Luke Grimes, Mary Birdsong and Gabriel Luna

programme.title: The Forsaken
programme.desc: Driving from L.A. to Florida to deliver a vintage Mercedes and attend his sister's wedding, Sean does the one thing he wasn't supposed to do: pick up a hitchhiker. Sean's new companion, Nick, turns out to be a vampire hunter, tracking a roving band of forsaken youths who prey on hapless victims in the dead of night on deserted highways

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Veteran male stripper Magic Mike teaches a protégé about seducing women, making big bucks and hard partying in this comedy-drama inspired by Channing Tatum's life before he became an actor

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Circles. Gamby's disciplinary tactics are rebuked by Dr. Brown; Russell clashes with an unruly neighbor

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Feelgood tennis romance from the makers of Notting Hill. Low-ranking British pro Peter is inspired to greatness in his last Wimbledon tournament when he starts dating American golden girl Lizzie. But while their love match spurs him on, her game falls apart..

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: The US army flies in to reboot a destroyed London, but those still infected with the Rage Virus have other plans. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images. (2007)(96 mins)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: Alice, a web designer has a whirlwind romance with Adam, a mountain climber, getting engaged very quickly. But as things progress Alice realises she knows very little about her new spouse(n)

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: An alien invasion in a small American town turns locals into flesh-eating zombies. But the uninfected few, led by local sheriff Bill Pardy, band together to try and wipe out the plague before it spreads(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars in this uplifting and whimsical fable about a Texas rancher and family man who builds a rocket in his barn to fulfill his dream of blasting into space. Virginia Madsen, Max Thieriot, Bruce Dern, Tim Blake Nelson. Directed by Michael Polish(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: In this action-packed, special effect-filled super production, horrifying legendary creatures challenge the brave monster hunter Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman, X-Men). It all starts when Count Dracula (Richard Roxburgh) decides to use Dr. Victor Frankenstein's invention to create a legion of vampires. In order to do so, he needs to absorb the energy only the Werewolf can generate. To stop the experiment, the Vatican sends Van Helsing to Transylvania. There, together with Anna Valerious (Kate Beckinsale, Pearl Harbor) - whose family has been fighting the forces of evil for decades - he will face the terrifying monsters. The film was directed by the talented Stephen Sommers (The Mummy, The Mummy Returns)(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns

programme.desc: Millionaire industrialist Steven Taylor is a man who has everything but what he craves most, the love and the fidelity of his wife. A hugely successful player in the financial world, he considers her to be his most treasured acquisition. But she needs more than the role of a dazzling accessory. Brilliant in her own right, she is involved with a struggling artist who fulfills her emotional needs. Her husband discovers her indiscretion and sets out to commit the perfect murder(n)

programme.title: Ghost

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: The creation of one of the most memorable books of the 1960s -- and the impact the writing and research would have on its author -- is explored in this drama based on a true story. In 1959, Truman Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman) was a critically acclaimed novelist who had earned a small degree of celebrity for his work when he read a short newspaper item about a multiple murder in a small Kansas town. For some reason, the story fascinated Capote, and he asked William Shawn (Bob Balaban), his editor at The New Yorker, to let him write a piece about the case. Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's

programme.title: South Central
programme.desc: (1992) Steve Anderson's debut feature tells the story of LA gang member Bobby (Glenn Plummer), who comes out of prison only to find the new boss (Byron Minns) has turned the gang into a drug-dealing operation. Bobby's woman, Carole (Larita Shelby), is also now turning tricks to feed her habit and is neglecting his son, who was born while he was inside. Pressured into committing a murder for the gang, Bobby is caught and sent down again; but this time, there is a chance of redemption and possible salvation when he once again regains his freedom. M,W,R,S

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Writer/director Paul Thomas Anderson followed his critical and commercial breakthrough Boogie Nights with this wildly ambitious story of lives intertwining on a single day in California's San Fernando Valley. Earl Partridge (Jason Robards), a successful producer of television game shows, left his wife when she contracted cancer to marry the younger and more beautiful Linda (Julianne Moore). Now, Earl has cancer himself, and Linda spends her day fetching medicines and trying to deal with the imminent death of her husband, whom she has only now come to love. Earl asks his nurse Phil (Philip Seymour Hoffman) to arrange a meeting with his estranged son, Frank Mackey (Tom Cruise), known for his self-help program "Seduce and Destroy," in which he preaches the importance of male sexual prowess; he cared for his mother after Earl left her, and he has no desire to see his father again. Earl's best-known show is hosted by Jimmy Gator (Philip Baker Hall), who also learns that he is dying. Jimmy's show pits bright adults against unusually smart kids; one of Jimmy's child contestants, Stanley (Jeremy Blackman), arrives late for a taping after being left stranded by his father Rick (Michael Bowen), who is supported by his more successful son. Meanwhile, Donnie Smith (William H. Macy), who was a champ on Jimmy's show as a child, is not having as much luck as an adult; he's just lost his job and needs to pay for some expensive dental work. Jimmy wants to reconcile with his estranged and emotionally fragile daughter Claudia (Melora Walters), who despises him and who will become involved with well-meaning police officer Jim Kurring (John C. Reilly), who has been desperately lonely since his divorce three years ago. Magnolia reunites much of the cast and crew of Boogie Nights and features eight original songs by singer/songwriter Aimee Mann and a musical score by Jon Brion(n)

programme.desc: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch are back home in London and they're throwing a party for some of their friends. With a party to organise the gang get to work - Matilda's brother Jack and sisters Megan and Holly take shopping to another level as they speed along the river Thames on a high-performance rib to pick up supplies. Matilda's in charge of the party food: build your own spicy sausage pitta bread sandwiches with zingy yoghurt sauce and popcorn cakes. The popcorn cakes idea came from Scarlet, a Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch viewer who emailed it to Matilda's Food Blog. Great food, friends and fun, and the party finishing with a bang when the guys play an explosive game with a watermelon - parties don't get much better!.
